result.eng: Do you like eating in restaurants?
result.ga: An maith libh bheith ag ithe i mbialanna
result.orig: An maith libh bheith ag ithe i mbialanna
result.html: An maith libh bheith ag ithe i mbialannaDo you like eating in restaurants?
result.ponchtml: An maiṫ liḃ ḃeiṫ ag iṫe i mbialannaDo you like eating in restaurants?

result.eng: Do you eat in restaurants or do you cook at home?
result.ga: An itheann tú i mbialanna nó an mbíonn tú ag cócaireacht sa bhaile
result.orig: An itheann tú i mbialanna nó an mbíonn tú ag cócaireacht sa bhaile
result.html: An itheann tú i mbialanna nó an mbíonn tú ag cócaireacht sa bhaileDo you eat in restaurants or do you cook at home?
result.ponchtml: An iṫeann tú i mbialanna nó an mbíonn tú ag cócaireaċt sa ḃaileDo you eat in restaurants or do you cook at home?

result.eng: I must have met them once or twice because we ate in the same restaurants.
result.ga: Caithfidh gur bhuail mé leo uair nó dhó ó d'ith muid sna bialanna céanna
result.orig: Caithfidh gur bhuail mé leo uair nó dhó ó d'ith muid sna bialanna céanna
result.html: Caithfidh gur bhuail mé leo uair nó dhó ó d'ith muid sna bialanna céannaI must have met them once or twice because we ate in the same restaurants.
result.ponchtml: Caiṫfiḋ gur ḃuail mé leo uair nó ḋó ó d'iṫ muid sna bialanna céannaI must have met them once or twice because we ate in the same restaurants.

result.eng: They would meet in restaurants and exchange bags that looked the same.
result.ga: Ba ghnách leo bualadh le chéile i mbialanna agus málaí a mhalartú a raibh an chuma chéanna orthu
result.orig: Ba ghnách leo bualadh le chéile i mbialanna agus málaí a mhalartú a raibh an chuma chéanna orthu
result.html: Ba ghnách leo bualadh le chéile i mbialanna agus málaí a mhalartú a raibh an chuma chéanna orthuThey would meet in restaurants and exchange bags that looked the same.
result.ponchtml: Ba ġnáċ leo bualaḋ le ċéile i mbialanna agus málaí a ṁalartú a raiḃ an ċuma ċéanna orṫuThey would meet in restaurants and exchange bags that looked the same.
